alert.note: Alert for Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Salt Basin; Southern Hudspeth Highlands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 26 at 6:38PM CST until February 27 at 1:00AM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 55 mph with gusts up to 80 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central New Mexico including the Sacramento Mountains and far west Texas, including far east El Paso and most of Hudspeth county. * WHEN...Until midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The peak winds have passed, but strong winds continue over the next few hours. Winds slowly decrease through the evening.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Salt Basin; Southern Hudspeth Highlands
